sentence: The atmosphere at the stadium tonight was electric.
The game was so intense I forgot to breathe at times. What a win!
It had me hooked from the first chapter.
It’s more of a slow burn than a page-turner, but it’s well-written, I guess.
It’s split into two timelines, which keeps it interesting but also a bit confusing at times.
I could watch this film a hundred times and still find something new to love about it.
Best thriller I’ve seen in ages. Had me on the edge of my seat the entire time.
How do you concede three goals in ten minutes? The whole defence needs replacing.
They rotated their squad for the cup game, which wasn’t surprising given the schedule.

The author’s writing style is so unique – poetic, but not over the top.
I don't get how was it supposed to work without any chemistry between the leads.
It's still 0-0 so far, so way too early to tell - both teams trying their hardest, but maybe it won't be enough?

It's really incredibly impressive to mess up such a tested blockbuster formula.
